titles: A sermon preached before the Kings Maiestie at White-Hall, on Munday the 25. of December, being Christmas day, anno 1609. By the Bishop of Elie His Maiesties almoner
author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
